task.title: Maintaining Vehicle Engine Oil System
task.shortdesc: Procedures for properly filling and maintaining the engine's oil reservoir during initial and ongoing vehicle operation.

taskbody.prereq: Use medium light, high-grade gas engine oil

step.cmd: Fill crankcase with oil through front breather pipe
step.stepxmp: Remove metal cap, pour oil slowly

step.cmd: Check oil level in flywheel casing

substep.cmd: Locate two pet cocks in flywheel casing.
Pour oil until it runs out of upper cock.
Leave upper cock open until flow stops.

step.stepresult: Keep oil midway between two cocks, never below lower cock

ul.li: Verify oil supply to necessary parts
